tool_description: The GeniusLyrics-API is a gateway to the world of music, lyrics, and rich annotations. With this powerful API, developers can seamlessly access an extensive database of lyrics and explore music-related data. Gain access to a vast collection of lyrics for songs across various genres and eras. Dive deep into the meaning and context behind the lyrics with the ability to access annotations, explanations, and insights provided by the Genius community. Extract valuable information about artists, al...
name: GeniusLyrics-API
title: GeniusLyrics-API

get_song_annotations
get_song_info

api_list.name: search_song

required_parameters.name: song
required_parameters.description: search song. You may include the artist name to filter the results more For example: waiting for love by Avicci or waiting for love - avicii or avicii waiting for love or avicii - waiting for love

api_list.name: get_lyrics

required_parameters.name: song_id
